EXPORT.CONCEPT_TO_CONCEPT: Export templates for selected concept to selected to concept
EXPORT.TO_CONCEPT: Export templates for selected to concept

AVAILABLE.TITLE: Available concept templates
AVAILABLE.CONCEPT: For available concept templates, any concept can be selected.
AVAILABLE.TEMPLATES: With available concept templates on, all templates available for use with the selected concept are displayed.

EXPLICIT.TITLE: Explicit concept templates
EXPLICIT.CONCEPT: With available concept templates off, only concept with explicit templates can be selected.
EXPLICIT.TEMPLATES: With available concept templates off, only templates explicitly defined for the selected concept are displayed.
